show_name: Araiso Private High School Student Council Executive Committee (OAV)
other_title: 私立荒磯高等学校生徒会執行部 (Japanese)
plot: Kubota Makoto and Tokitoh Minoru (characters from Kazuya Minekura's manga Wild Adaptor -- though no reference is made to the darker storyline of WA in this light-hearted anime) are the muscle of their high school's all-powerful student council. They defend the student body from disorder -- generated by both humans and demons -- while avoiding their classes.
opening_theme: "Heaven's door" by Toshiyuki Morikawa + Hideo Ishikawa
